long_description: Designed specifically for self massage and muscle regeneration, the 24 in. GoFit Extreme Massage Roller targets muscle pain caused by exercise and everyday activities. Uses range from stretching and light tissue massage to deep tissue and maximum muscle relief. Egg crate design emulates massage to work on deep-tissue trigger points and help restore flexibility. Durable closed-cell foam roller with a rigid PVC hollow core has an outside diameter of 6 in. (16cm) and an inside diameter of 4 in. (11cm). The GoFit Extreme Massage Roller includes a training manual.
short_description: Designed specifically for self massage and muscle regeneration, the 24 in. GoFit Extreme Massage Roller targets muscle pain caused by exercise and everyday activities.
